00020 void UnitTester::setName(const string newName) {
00021    if (testerName == "Unnamed") {
00022       testerName = newName;
00023    } else {
00024       cout << "WARNING: tried to set UnitTester name to \"" << newName 
00025            << "\" when it was already \"" << testerName << "\"." << endl;
00026    }
00027 }
00028 
00029 void UnitTester::checkForPass(
00030                   const bool cond, 
00031                   const string passMessage, const string failureMessage,
00032                   const char code[], const char fileName[],
00033                   const int lineNumber)
00034 {
00035    if (cond) {
00036       //test passed
00037       if (passMessage != "") {
00038          cout << "  PASSED: " << passMessage << endl;
00039       } else {
00040          cout << "  PASSED: " << code << endl;
00041       }
00042 
00043    } else {
00044       //test failure
00045       cout << "  FAILED: " << failureMessage << endl;
00046       cout << "  |   in <" << fileName << "> on line " << lineNumber << endl;
00047       cout << "  |   " << code << endl;
00048       cout << "  +-------------------------------" << endl;
00049 
00050       stillPassing = false;
00051    }
00052 }
00053 
00054 void UnitTester::printResult() const
00055 {
00056    cout << "==================================================" << endl;
00057    cout << "Unit testing for <" << testerName << ">" << endl;
00058 
00059    if (stillPassing) {
00060       cout << "PASSED" << endl;
00061    } else {
00062       cout << "FAILED" << endl;
00063    }
00064 
00065    cout << "==================================================" << endl;
00066 }
